t: Kroger fights back at Amazon-owned Whole Foods and launches an apparel brand
s: November 3, 2017 - Kroger, in the aftermath of the Amazon-Whole Foods deal, aims to be a destination for more than just groceries. The supermarket chain announced Friday morning that it's launching an apparel brand in the fall of next year.

t: As Amazon takes Whole Foods national, Kroger thinks local
s: September 25, 2017 - Kroger is looking to work with more local brands. Under Amazon, Whole Foods is scaling back a similar initiative.

t: Amazon closes a business designed to take on Kroger, Walmart - TheStreet
s: February 2, 2024 - The online giant has stumbled in its efforts to take on Kroger, Walmart, Target, and Publix. ... Amazon scaled back many of its brick-and-mortar ambitions last year. As the company laid off workers, it also gave up on its fashion and "5 Star" brick-and-mortar projects.

t: Amazon takes aim at Kroger with Whole Foods deal
s: June 16, 2017 - Kroger shares dove by double digits for the second day in a row Friday after Amazon announced it would acquire Whole Foods Markets in a $13.7 billion takeover. t: Kroger Debuts Online Marketplace to Rival Amazon, Walmart
s: August 11, 2020 - In a bid to compete with retail giants like Amazon and Walmart, Kroger Ship, the brand’s home delivery arm, is launching an ecommerce site open to third-party sellers.
